title: Purchase a Seat Upgrade
description: A passenger with an existing economy ticket wants to upgrade to an extra legroom seat.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and view the seat map for their flight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the booking and sees available extra legroom seats.

tasks.description: Inform the passenger of the cost to upgrade to a selected extra legroom seat.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct price for the seat upgrade.

tasks.description: Process the seat change and collect payment for the upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the passenger's seat assignment and issues a new boarding pass.
